segments.text: The boy is climbing on that wobbly two-step stool, and my heart races just watching him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can see his determination as he reaches for the cookie jar with one hand.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What if the stool tips and he falls? It’s a disaster waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The way his little body stretches makes me anxious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Is no one paying attention to the risks involved in this whole cookie heist?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl standing beside him looks so expectant, her palm open for the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: In this moment, it’s all about the thrill of sneaking cookies, and I can’t help but watch in fascination.
segments.speaker: PAR
